snippet.title: Salt and Sacrifice Release Date Trailer - November 7, 2023 | Steam/Switch
snippet.description:
As a Marked Inquisitor, you’ll journey through the western frontier: pursuing, hunting, and obliterating the evil that plagues the realm. Craft unique weapons and armor from the otherworldly flesh and bones of the Mages you destroy. Team up with a fellow Inquisitor for full online co-op and drop-in quickplay online co-op, or engage in fast and chaotic PvP through various factions.

Coming to Steam and Nintendo Switch 11/7/2023.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1437400/Salt_and_Sacrifice/
